roleset.name: make into a sure thing
roleset.note: CLINCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'clinch' based on sentences in wsj. No access to verbnet at the moment. (from clinch.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Dewey Defeats Truman!
example.text: In the previous three general elections, similar national issues clinched the vote.
example.arg: In the previous three general elections
